notes.text: We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
We now display the correct message when an action is triggered for multiple rows in isolated mode and the message target is in the action parameter dialog
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
We now ensure that page navigation after a document creation works in apps using the flexible column layout
We now ensure that the UI.ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works properly even when a value is set for the Exclude property in the filter bar
We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
We now support key user adaptation for actions
We've resolved an issue that led to the loading of the sap.insight message bundle twice
We now ensure that the Edit button works correctly on a subobject page in sticky mode
You can now paste data into the ReadyOnly columns of a table
You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
We now consider the value type when parsing default values in startup parameters
We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
You can now use the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation to skip validating decimal digits in a unit-specific scale
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
We now ensure that the header form of the object page coming from a navigation property works correctly
Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
We now ensure that applications open correctly in SAP Build Work Zone
